interfaces.name: FilterStatusType
KcNavItemType

components.name: BaseLayoutComponent
ButtonComponent
components.templateData:
<button
    [id]="id"
    [name]="name"
    [ngClass]="classes"
    [color]="color"
    [disabled]="disabled"
    class="kc-button"
    (click)="onClick($event)"
    mat-button
>
    <ng-content></ng-content>
    <mat-icon *ngIf="icon && iconPosition=='right'" class="kc-button__icon" iconPositionEnd>{{ icon }}</mat-icon>
    <mat-icon *ngIf="icon && iconPosition=='left'" class="kc-button__icon">{{ icon }}</mat-icon>
</button>

components.name: CardComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-card  class="kc-card mat-elevation-z2">
  <mat-card-header class="kc-card-header" [class.hidden]="!hasHeader">
    <mat-card-title class="kc-card-header__title" #cardHeader>
      <ng-content select="[card-title]"></ng-content>
    </mat-card-title>
  </mat-card-header>
  <mat-card-content class="kc-card-body" [class.withOutFooter]="!hasFooter">
    <ng-content></ng-content>
  </mat-card-content>
  <mat-card-actions class="kc-card-footer" [class.hidden]="!hasFooter" #cardFooter>
    <ng-content select="[card-footer]"></ng-content>
  </mat-card-actions>

</mat-card>

components.name: ChipComponent
components.templateData: {{icon}} {{label}} {{icon}}

components.name: FilterComponent
components.templateData:
{{label}}:
{{getOptionLabel(option)}} cancel
